dict.acceptation: 公主；王妃（王族女性成员）；女巨头，女名家；<古>女王；

sent.orig: All these people lined up for the Princess Princess show?
sent.trans: 这些人都在排队等候参加princess演唱会吗？

sent.orig: Also known as photochemicalhong hua Princess Princess, Empress Wu, the letters to Princess Dae Jang Xiping.
sent.trans: 弘化公主也叫光化公主，武则天时，改封西平大长公主。

sent.orig: Crown Prince Naruhito, 46, and Crown Princess Masako, 42 have one child, 4-year-old Princess Aiko.
sent.trans: 46岁的皇太子德仁和42岁的皇太妃雅子只有一个4岁的女儿爱子公主。

sent.orig: And she was a princess and shea princess now!
sent.trans: 小公主，是的吧，命运的虹彩总会驱散灰色的乌云的。

sent.orig: Sometimes a princess is just a princess and taken as such.
sent.trans: 有时候，公主就只是个公主，不该太当回事。
